documentation.content: Alert fires when the database size is growing greater than expected (this value will be subject to instance size and utilization); defaulted to 93 GB but will be subject to instance size as well as connected storage.

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query:
fetch gce_instance
| metric 'workload.googleapis.com/postgresql.db_size'
| group_by 1m, [value_db_size_mean: mean(value.db_size)]
| every 1m
| cast_units "By"
| condition val() > 1e+11 "By"
